@binki Despite being flawed in few ways, such as in what you pointed out, Long Black raises a good point about the flaw in NorwegianboyEE's argument. Coping and substitution are not interchangeable (in this context). Anyone with an inherent urge to commit murder or sexual assault has no substitute, there is no containing the urge, only curing it. Being a pedophile does not make you a child touching murderer, much in the same sense that being a heterosexual doesn't make you a raping murderer (not to confuse sexuality with pedophilia (and entirely different subject)). What I'm saying is lolicon isn't any more likely to sway anyone from committing a crime as say regular porn.
